body.name: 100% Natural Bamboo Charcoal Air Purifying Bag - Set of 12 Carbon Filters, Deodorizer Bags, Odor Absorber for Diaper Pail, Trash, Shoes, Closets, Cars, Fridge, Pets House, Kitchen, Home by purifyou
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 32 mins
features: Sustainable: These charcoal air purifying bag filters come from the finest natural Moso Bamboo that utilizes activated carbon technology. Perfect natural air fresheners for home.
Fresh and Clean: Our activated charcoal odor eliminator filters the air you breathe and work in all corners of your home. They maximize odor elimination instead of masking odors.
Versatile: Use anywhere in your home that suffers from stink! The most popular destinations are diaper pails, trash cans, closets, cars, fridges, and near pets.
Long-lasting: Each sachet lasts up to two weeks but can renew for up to 3 months by placing them under the sun for 2-3 hours at a time to reactivate the odor-absorbing powers.

Inclusion: This set includes (12) Carbon Filters and comes with a burlap bag. Dimension: 6.5 cm / 2.56" x 8 cm / 3.15" per sachet. Weight: 14 g / 0.51 oz per sachet. Now have up to 25% more than other leading diaper pail refills on the market!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eliminate unpleasant smells Designed to address unwanted odors, our bamboo filters are perfect for your diaper pail, shoe closet, and so much more. Let it bathe under the sun Our filters generally last between 12 to 15 days. To re-use them, put the filters in direct sunlight to "recharge" its odor-eliminating property. Made from Highly renewable resource Moso Bamboo is a highly renewable resource consisting of large-shaped porous granules maximizing odor elimination.

EACH SET INCLUDES: 12 pcs. Carbon Filters 1 Drawstring Burlap BagDimension: 6.5 cm / 2.56" x 8 cm / 3.15" per sachet. Weight: 14 g / 0.51 oz per sachet. SPECIAL FEATURES: Purity Level - Maximizing odor elimination and not just masking odors like other deodorizers10 times more surface area and 4 times better adsorption rate than regular charcoalHas negative ionic charge that attracts odor and excess moisture in the atmosphere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great removes smells in closets and everywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, but Mighty Odor Controlling Pouches
reviews.reviewText: Buy these, you won't be sorry. I traded up my diaper genie for a stylish Ubbi diaper pail, but had serious regrets when the stench reached new levels (and not in a good way)! I loved that the Ubbi allows any trash bag to be used, but let me say regular trash bags, even with Febreeze scent, didn't help with the odor at all! Every time I opened the pail to add a new diaper and especially when it was full and time to empty, the odor that seeped out was so strong it filled the room and seemed to hang there for 15-20 mins. My husband found it unbearable and was begging to go back to the old genie that contained the smell a lot better, but after spending so much on the Ubbi, I decided to try these little pouches to see if they can save the day...and let me say, YES, they work wonders! I would highly, highly recommend giving these a try. I have two in my pail now, one on the bottom, the other taped to the lid, and they started working immediately. No more complaints, blaming the dog for the fart smell in the nursery or false sniffs thinking the baby pooped again. I can't wait to try them out on a stinky pair of sneakers next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: But I found the whole a week before purchase but I feel a lot safer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits diaper genie
reviews.reviewText: They were ok. Fits well into my diaper genie. I placed one inside the lid and one in the bottom of the pail. I wouldn't say they work amazingly. Maybe some stink is gone but I don't know if anything can completely get rid of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom purchased and dad approved!
reviews.reviewText: These work wonders! If your having the open the diaper pail and then huge stinky scent comes pour out this fixes that! We have been using for a week or so and have noticed huge difference even if at 15 days when we try and re-energize them if that doesn’t work we would just use a brand new one and replace every 15 days and pay for new ones when needed as it’s totally worth it so solve a problem that we lived with with our first LO the whole time and now on #2 have finally fix this stinky problem at almost 2 years old but I guess better now than never!Highly recommend! Even dad said these are the best thing you have purchased that I didn’t know existed! Give it 6 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Jury is still out on these
reviews.reviewText: I got these to put in the tray of my litter robot to help keep the smell under control. I have read other people with the same litter box have had great luck with using charcoal to help odor control so I thought I’d try these. I threw about 6 of these in the drawer and have not noticed a difference. The search continues for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I have been using these in my diaper pails for the last 6 years. (3 babies in 6 years ). It neutralizes bad odors immediately and the last forever. One purchase lasts me almost 3 years. Love this product and I love that’s it’s all natural. I simply tape the bag on the lid, inside of the diaper pail, and my roomsSmells fresh for months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Complex and not worth it not buying on brand
reviews.reviewText: I disliked that it said it would last long but only lasted about a half of a month or a month longer than the usual brand I used no matter how many times they were put outside in the sun. No scent really but by the month and a half they'd slowly stop working even after I'd sun the pads for the time. I have not purchased since the first time. Added work with sunning then to TRY to get them to work longer flopped for me. I've been back to diaper genie filter brand and they last a month as advertised.
As directed placed one at the bottom and one in the lid which helps minimize the odours of our nappy bins.
